name: (C²FO)
tag_list: dynamic-discounting, saas, scf, supply-chain-finance, reverse-factoring, sap, oracle, erp
overview:
Collaborative Cash Flow Optimization (C2FO) delivers compelling returns of your short-term cash while simultaneously addressing the cash flow needs of your suppliers.

WHAT: On-line, early payment auctions where your suppliers make dynamic bids for accelerated payment of their approved invoices by discounting those invoices in real-time, 30 minute QuickPay Events.

HOW: Your suppliers log into the (C2FO) Supplier Portal to view their approved invoices and to select their invoices for payment acceleration. They place pre-bids before the QuickPay Event, and during the QuickPay Event they increase their bid(s) iteratively according to their condition status relative to other bids being placed by your other participating suppliers.

WHY: Because you need better investment returns on your short-term cash, improved gross profit margin and a better bottom line. And, because your suppliers need better cash flow and funding sources.
